name: CXSetMutedCallAction
desc: An encapsulation of the act of muting or unmuting a call.

items.name: init(call: UUID, muted: Bool)
items.desc: Initializes a new action for a call identified by a given UUID, as well as whether the call is muted.

items.name: init?(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Creates a new action for a call with data in an unarchiver.

items.name: var isMuted: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the call is muted.
